text: إِذۡ هَمَّت طَّآئِفَتَانِ مِنكُمۡ أَن تَفۡشَلَا وَٱللَّهُ وَلِيُّهُمَاۗ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

translation.en: When two parties among you were about to lose courage, but Allah was their ally; and upon Allah the believers should rely
translation.id: (ketika dua golongan dari pihak kamu140) ingin (mundur) karena takut, padahal Allah adalah penolong mereka. Karena itu, hendaklah kepada Allah saja orang-orang mukmin bertawakal
